name: WeWillRockYou
0:
”Alexa, open We Will Rock You”
”Alexa, Pause”
”Alexa, Resume”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: we will rock you
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Skill capable of playing rock/motivational music. Multiple audio tracks are available.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

1. Enable this Alexa skill.
2. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
3. Click + to add a new routine.
4. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
5. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
6. Choose "Your Skills".
7. Select this skill.
8. Click Next.
9. Choose Device to perform the routine to.
10. Click Save.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
